verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> and to Aaron <S%H175><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> unto them,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, These <S%H2063><s%> are the beasts <S%H2416><s%> which ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> among all the beasts <S%H929><s%> that are on the earth <S%H776><s%>.

Whatsoever parteth <S%H6536><s%> the hoof <S%H6541><s%>, and is clovenfooted <S%H8156><s%> <S%H8157><s%>, and cheweth <S%H5927><s%> the cud <S%H1625><s%>, among the beasts <S%H929><s%>, that shall ye eat <S%H398><s%>.

Nevertheless <S%H389><s%> these shall ye not eat <S%H398><s%> of them that chew <S%H5927><s%> the cud <S%H1625><s%>, or of them that divide <S%H6536><s%> the hoof <S%H6541><s%>: as the camel <S%H1581><s%>, because he cheweth <S%H5927><s%> the cud <S%H1625><s%>, but divideth <S%H6536><s%> not the hoof <S%H6541><s%>; he is unclean <S%H2931><s%> unto you.
And the coney <S%H8227><s%>, because he cheweth <S%H5927><s%> the cud <S%H1625><s%>, but divideth <S%H6536><s%> not the hoof <S%H6541><s%>; he is unclean <S%H2931><s%> unto you.
And the hare <S%H768><s%>, because he cheweth <S%H5927><s%> the cud <S%H1625><s%>, but divideth <S%H6536><s%> not the hoof <S%H6541><s%>; he is unclean <S%H2931><s%> unto you.

And the swine <S%H2386><s%>, though he divide <S%H6536><s%> the hoof <S%H6541><s%>, and be clovenfooted <S%H8156><s%> <S%H8157><s%>, yet he cheweth <S%H1641><s%> not the cud <S%H1625><s%>; he is unclean <S%H2931><s%> to you.
Of their flesh <S%H1320><s%> shall ye not eat <S%H398><s%>, and their carcase <S%H5038><s%> shall ye not touch <S%H5060><s%>; they are unclean <S%H2931><s%> to you.

These shall ye eat <S%H398><s%> of all that are in the waters <S%H4325><s%>: whatsoever hath fins <S%H5579><s%> and scales <S%H7193><s%> in the waters <S%H4325><s%>, in the seas <S%H3220><s%>, and in the rivers <S%H5158><s%>, them shall ye eat <S%H398><s%>.

And all that have not fins <S%H5579><s%> and scales <S%H7193><s%> in the seas <S%H3220><s%>, and in the rivers <S%H5158><s%>, of all that move <S%H8318><s%> in the waters <S%H4325><s%>, and of any living <S%H2416><s%> thing <S%H5315><s%> which is in the waters <S%H4325><s%>, they shall be an abomination <S%H8263><s%> unto you:
They shall be even an abomination <S%H8263><s%> unto you; ye shall not eat <S%H398><s%> of their flesh <S%H1320><s%>, but ye shall have their carcases <S%H5038><s%> in abomination <S%H8262><s%>.
Whatsoever hath no fins <S%H5579><s%> nor scales <S%H7193><s%> in the waters <S%H4325><s%>, that shall be an abomination <S%H8263><s%> unto you.

And these are they which ye shall have in abomination <S%H8262><s%> among <S%H4480><s%> the fowls <S%H5775><s%>; they shall not be eaten <S%H398><s%>, they are an abomination <S%H8263><s%>: the eagle <S%H5404><s%>, and the ossifrage <S%H6538><s%>, and the ospray <S%H5822><s%>,
And the vulture <S%H1676><s%>, and the kite <S%H344><s%> after his kind <S%H4327><s%>;
Every raven <S%H6158><s%> after his kind <S%H4327><s%>;
And the owl <S%H1323><s%> <S%H3284><s%>, and the night hawk <S%H8464><s%>, and the cuckow <S%H7828><s%>, and the hawk <S%H5322><s%> after his kind <S%H4327><s%>,
And the little owl <S%H3563><s%>, and the cormorant <S%H7994><s%>, and the great owl <S%H3244><s%>,
And the swan <S%H8580><s%>, and the pelican <S%H6893><s%>, and the gier eagle <S%H7360><s%>,
And the stork <S%H2624><s%>, the heron <S%H601><s%> after her kind <S%H4327><s%>, and the lapwing <S%H1744><s%>, and the bat <S%H5847><s%>.
All fowls <S%H5775><s%> that creep <S%H8318><s%>, going <S%H1980><s%> upon all four <S%H702><s%>, shall be an abomination <S%H8263><s%> unto you.

Yet these may ye eat <S%H398><s%> of every flying <S%H5775><s%> creeping <S%H8318><s%> thing that goeth <S%H1980><s%> upon all four <S%H702><s%>, which have legs <S%H3767><s%> above <S%H4605><s%> their feet <S%H7272><s%>, to leap <S%H5425><s%> withal <S%H2004><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>;

Even these of them ye may eat <S%H398><s%>; the locust <S%H697><s%> after his kind <S%H4327><s%>, and the bald locust <S%H5556><s%> after his kind <S%H4327><s%>, and the beetle <S%H2728><s%> after his kind <S%H4327><s%>, and the grasshopper <S%H2284><s%> after his kind <S%H4327><s%>.
But all other flying <S%H5775><s%> creeping things <S%H8318><s%>, which have four <S%H702><s%> feet <S%H7272><s%>, shall be an abomination <S%H8263><s%> unto you.
And for these ye shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%>: whosoever toucheth <S%H5060><s%> the carcase <S%H5038><s%> of them shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until the even <S%H6153><s%>.
And whosoever beareth <S%H5375><s%> ought of the carcase <S%H5038><s%> of them shall wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes <S%H899><s%>, and be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until the even <S%H6153><s%>.

The carcases of every beast <S%H929><s%> which divideth <S%H6536><s%> the hoof <S%H6541><s%>, and is not clovenfooted <S%H8157><s%> <S%H8156><s%>, nor cheweth <S%H5927><s%> the cud <S%H1625><s%>, are unclean <S%H2931><s%> unto you: every one that toucheth <S%H5060><s%> them shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%>.

And whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H1992><s%> goeth <S%H1980><s%> upon his paws <S%H3709><s%>, among all manner of beasts <S%H2416><s%> that go <S%H1980><s%> on all four <S%H702><s%>, those are unclean <S%H2931><s%> unto you: whoso toucheth <S%H5060><s%> their carcase <S%H5038><s%> shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until the even <S%H6153><s%>.

And he that beareth <S%H5375><s%> the carcase <S%H5038><s%> of them shall wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes <S%H899><s%>, and be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until the even <S%H6153><s%>: they are unclean <S%H2931><s%> unto you.

These also shall be unclean <S%H2931><s%> unto you among the creeping things <S%H8318><s%> that creep <S%H8317><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>; the weasel <S%H2467><s%>, and the mouse <S%H5909><s%>, and the tortoise <S%H6632><s%> after his kind <S%H4327><s%>,
And the ferret <S%H604><s%>, and the chameleon <S%H3581><s%>, and the lizard <S%H3911><s%>, and the snail <S%H2546><s%>, and the mole <S%H8580><s%>.

These are unclean <S%H2931><s%> to you among all that creep <S%H8318><s%>: whosoever doth touch <S%H5060><s%> them, when they be dead <S%H4194><s%>, shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until the even <S%H6153><s%>.

And upon whatsoever any of them, when they are dead <S%H4194><s%>, doth fall <S%H5307><s%>, it shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%>; whether it be any vessel <S%H3627><s%> of wood <S%H6086><s%>, or raiment <S%H899><s%>, or skin <S%H5785><s%>, or sack <S%H8242><s%>, whatsoever vessel <S%H3627><s%> it be, wherein any work <S%H4399><s%> is done <S%H6213><s%>, it must be put <S%H935><s%> into water <S%H4325><s%>, and it shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until the even <S%H6153><s%>; so it shall be cleansed <S%H2891><s%>.

And every earthen <S%H2789><s%> vessel <S%H3627><s%>, whereinto any of them falleth <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8432><s%>, whatsoever is in it shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%>; and ye shall break <S%H7665><s%> it.

Of all meat <S%H400><s%> which may be eaten <S%H398><s%>, that on which such water <S%H4325><s%> cometh <S%H935><s%> shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%>: and all drink <S%H4945><s%> that may be drunk <S%H8354><s%> in every such vessel <S%H3627><s%> shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%>.

And every thing whereupon any part of their carcase <S%H5038><s%> falleth <S%H5307><s%> shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%>; whether it be oven <S%H8574><s%>, or ranges <S%H3600><s%> for pots, they shall be broken down <S%H5422><s%>: for they are unclean <S%H2931><s%>, and shall be unclean <S%H2931><s%> unto you.

Nevertheless a fountain <S%H4599><s%> or pit <S%H953><s%>, wherein there is plenty <S%H4723><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%>, shall be clean <S%H2889><s%>: but that which toucheth <S%H5060><s%> their carcase <S%H5038><s%> shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%>. wherein: Heb. a gathering together of waters
And if any part of their carcase <S%H5038><s%> fall <S%H5307><s%> upon any sowing <S%H2221><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> which is to be sown <S%H2232><s%>, it shall be clean <S%H2889><s%>.
But if any water <S%H4325><s%> be put <S%H5414><s%> upon the seed <S%H2233><s%>, and any part of their carcase <S%H5038><s%> fall <S%H5307><s%> thereon, it shall be unclean <S%H2931><s%> unto you.

And if any beast <S%H929><s%>, of which ye may eat <S%H402><s%>, die <S%H4191><s%>; he that toucheth <S%H5060><s%> the carcase <S%H5038><s%> thereof shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until the even <S%H6153><s%>.

And he that eateth <S%H398><s%> of the carcase <S%H5038><s%> of it shall wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes <S%H899><s%>, and be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until the even <S%H6153><s%>: he also that beareth <S%H5375><s%> the carcase <S%H5038><s%> of it shall wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes <S%H899><s%>, and be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until the even <S%H6153><s%>.
And every creeping thing <S%H8318><s%> that creepeth <S%H8317><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%> shall be an abomination <S%H8263><s%>; it shall not be eaten <S%H398><s%>.

Whatsoever goeth <S%H1980><s%> upon the belly <S%H1512><s%>, and whatsoever goeth <S%H1980><s%> upon all four <S%H702><s%>, or whatsoever hath more <S%H7235><s%> feet <S%H7272><s%> among all creeping things <S%H8318><s%> that creep <S%H8317><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>, them ye shall not eat <S%H398><s%>; for they are an abomination <S%H8263><s%>. hath: Heb. doth multiply feet

Ye shall not make <S%H8262><s%> yourselves <S%H5315><s%> abominable <S%H8262><s%> with any creeping thing <S%H8318><s%> that creepeth <S%H8317><s%>, neither shall ye make yourselves unclean <S%H2933><s%> with them, that ye should be defiled <S%H2930><s%> thereby. yourselves abominable: Heb. your souls, etc

For I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>: ye shall therefore sanctify yourselves <S%H6942><s%>, and ye shall be holy <S%H6918><s%>; for I am holy <S%H6918><s%>: neither shall ye defile <S%H2930><s%> yourselves <S%H5315><s%> with any manner of creeping thing <S%H8318><s%> that creepeth <S%H7430><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>.

For I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> that bringeth <S%H5927><s%> you up out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, to be your God <S%H430><s%>: ye shall therefore be holy <S%H6918><s%>, for I am holy <S%H6918><s%>.

This is the law <S%H8451><s%> of the beasts <S%H929><s%>, and of the fowl <S%H5775><s%>, and of every living <S%H2416><s%> creature <S%H5315><s%> that moveth <S%H7430><s%> in the waters <S%H4325><s%>, and of every creature <S%H5315><s%> that creepeth <S%H8317><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>:

To make a difference <S%H914><s%> between the unclean <S%H2931><s%> and the clean <S%H2889><s%>, and between the beast <S%H2416><s%> that may be eaten <S%H398><s%> and the beast <S%H2416><s%> that may not be eaten <S%H398><s%>.
